content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal experiences in creating an e-commerce website or designing one. However, based on my programmed knowledge, here are some general steps that can help in creating a user-friendly e-commerce website:

1. Research your target audience: Understanding your target audience needs is essential for creating a user-friendly e-commerce website. Gather feedback from your existing customers and competitors.

2. Create a clear brand identity: Build a brand that is simple and speaks to your target audience.

3. Plan your site architecture: Organize your site content and navigation that makes it easy for users to find and purchase items.

4. Choose a user-friendly e-commerce platform: Select the right platform that offers a user-friendly interface, comprehensive support, and easy integration.

5. Optimize website speed: Optimize website speed to ensure that your customers get an excellent buyer experience.

6. Enhance website security: Security is crucial for e-commerce, and you should use encryption and secure payment gateways to protect user information.

7. Keep it simple: Use simple language throughout the site enable users to understand the information provided easily.

8. Ensure compatibility with mobile devices: Ensure the site is mobile-friendly, can be easily navigated and viewed on mobile devices.

9. Provide excellent customer service: Provide exceptional customer service and support through call centres, email, or chatbots.

10. Test and refine: Regularly review and improve the website based on user feedback to keep the user experience intact.
